resources.string: This app was developed to run in the background and serve as a reminder to maintain proper posture. (Within WeekDays) Visit www.or-oz.com/posture to learn more. Thank you for downloading!

Welcome to Posture Reminder Plus! Press the settings button on the bottom right to get started. Remember, this app is optimized to run in the background. You can send a test notification by pressing the menu button at the top corner of the screen.
